mcq.statement: Choose the sentence with an ADJECTIVE CLAUSE in it: My boss like to have a monthly meeting. , My brother totally love cricket. ,The carpets that you bought last year have rotted. ,Please put those boxes under the table.

options.a: My boss like to have a monthly meeting.
options.c: The carpets that you bought last year have rotted.
options.d: Please put those boxes under the table.
